fields.message: Thank you for joining Take Back Day! We will remind you on April 28 so you can drop-off your unused drugs at [ADDRESS]. More information at 911-11-11
Thank you for joining Take Back Day! We will remind you on April 28 so you can drop-off your unused drugs. More information at 911-11-11
Hi! Thank you for taking part of Take Back Day. We will send you an email reminder on [DATE_OF_TBD] so you'll know when and where you can drop your unused drugs.
Hi! Thank you for taking part of Take Back Day. We will send you an email reminder on [DATE_OF_TBD] so you'll know when and where you can drop your unused drugs.
You have cancelled your subscription from Take Back Day! Drop-off your unused drugs anytime at your nearby pharmacy. To resubscribe, text TAKEBACKDAY to this number
You have unsubscribed from the email reminders. WE will no longer send you a reminder.
Today's the day! Drop-off your unused prescription drugs at [ADDRESS]! Having trouble? Go to 347-443-9
Today's the day! Drop-off your unused prescription drugs at [ADDRESS]!
